casebody.data:
Melissa KOLLAR, Petitioner-Petitioner,
v.
BOARD OF EDUCATION OF the TOWN OF HARRISON, Hudson County, Defendant-Respondent. (Commissioner of Education-Respondent) C-967 September Term 2017
079983 Supreme Court of New Jersey. November 29, 2017

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-005203-14 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied.
